item.title: 菲律宾比索因利率观点和资金外流跌至历史新低
item.description: 菲律宾比索跌至历史新低，原因是更多降息前景和股票进一步外流的压力越来越大。【原文：The Philippine peso fell to a new record low on mounting pressure from the prospect of more interest-rate cuts and further stock outflows.】

item.title: BE 称美中贸易缓和将限制关税对双方的打击
item.description: 彭博经济周刊》写道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国总统习近平达成的贸易缓和协议将限制关税对两国经济的打击，并使中国政府保持对美国的大部分出口。【原文：A trade detente agreed between US President Donald Trump and his Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping would limit the tariff blow to both economies and see Beijing maintain the bulk of its exports to America, Bloomberg Economics writes.】

item.title: 孟加拉国和巴基斯坦誓言在二十年后促进贸易关系
item.description: 孟加拉国和巴基斯坦承诺将经济、贸易和投资关系提升到 "新的战略高度"，这进一步表明这对昔日敌人之间的关系正在升温。【原文：Bangladesh and Pakistan pledged to elevate economic, trade and investment relations to a “new strategic level” in a further sign of warming ties between the former foes.】

item.title: 特朗普的贸易协议让美国在东南亚占据优势
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普来到东南亚，挥舞着被其办公室誉为 "历史性 "的贸易协议。不过，从更细微的细节来看，这一系列协议并不平衡，存在很多未知数。【原文：US President Donald Trump came to Southeast Asia wielding trade deals his office hailed as “historic.” The finer details, though, suggest a set of agreements that are uneven and with plenty of unknowns.】

item.title: 多米诺比萨企业因贝恩有意收购的报道而飙升
item.description: 在《澳大利亚金融评论报》报道贝恩资本正在考虑收购这家快餐连锁店，交易价值高达 40 亿澳元（26 亿美元）之后，多米诺比萨企业有限公司的股价飙升。【原文：Domino’s Pizza Enterprises Ltd. shares soared after the Australian Financial Review reported Bain Capital is considering buying the fast-food chain in a deal worth as much as A$4 billion ($2.6 billion).】

item.title: 红杉资本投资可取代初级银行家的人工智能工具
item.description:
Rogo称其人工智能平台可帮助投资银行家更快、更智能地开展工作。【原文：

Rogo says its AI platform helps investment bankers worker faster and smarter.

item.title: 英国零售商协会（BRC）称英国食品价格近五年来降幅最大
item.description: 受全球糖价回落的部分影响，英国食品支出创下近五年来的最大降幅。【原文：UK food bills have dropped at their sharpest rate in almost five years, dragged down partly by the global easing in sugar prices.】

item.title: 日本电产股票将因从日本日经指数除名而下跌至少 10
item.description: 日本电产公司的股票周二上午没有交易，预计将下跌至少 10%，因为该公司将从日经 225 日经平均指数中除名，并受到东京证券交易所的特别监督。【原文：Nidec Corp. shares were untraded on Tuesday morning, poised to tumble at least 10% as the company is set to be removed from the Nikkei 225 Stock Average and flagged for special oversight by the Tokyo Stock Exchange.】

item.title: 交易商关注原油供应过剩和俄罗斯原油制裁，油价保持稳定
item.description: 由于投资者权衡了供应过剩的迹象和美国制裁俄罗斯生产商的影响，石油在连续两天下跌后企稳。【原文：Oil steadied after two-day drop as investors weighed signs of a glut and the fallout from US sanctions on Russian producers.】

item.title: 中国利润反弹对关注贸易的多头来说意义不大
item.description: 中国企业很可能在本财报季实现多年来最好的盈利增长。然而，专注于中美紧张局势的股票交易员们表示，如果贸易谈判的进展出现动摇，利润的回升对市场的意义将微乎其微。【原文：Chinese corporates are likely to deliver their best earnings growth in years this results season. Yet, stock traders fixated on US-China tensions say the recovery in profits would mean little to the market should progress in trade negotiations falter.】

item.title: 中美关系进展抑制避险天堂需求，黄金维持在4000美元附近
item.description: 由于中美贸易谈判的进展削弱了避险资产的需求，黄金在周一跌破每盎司 4,000 美元后收复了一些失地。【原文：Gold clawed back some losses after plunging below $4,000 an ounce on Monday as progress in US-China trade talks sapped demand for haven assets.】

item.title: 稀土生产商期待美国引领的热潮削弱中国的力量
item.description:
即使贸易协议得以达成，该行业也在打赌世界不会愿意回到单一供应商的局面。【原文：

Even if a trade deal materializes, the industry is betting the world won’t want to go back to one supplier.

】

item.title: 出口稳健，本地需求旺盛，韩国经济增长加速
item.description: 韩国上一季度经济增长势头良好，这为韩国政府避免采取货币刺激措施提供了有利条件，因为他们需要权衡抑制房地产市场飙升的必要性和美国贸易政策的预期影响。【原文：South Korea’s economy gained momentum last quarter, bolstering the case for authorities to refrain from adding monetary stimulus as they weigh the need to rein in a sizzling housing market against the expected impact from US trade policies.】

item.title: 特朗普日本之行加剧债市对国防开支的担忧
item.description: 周二，日本政府债券市场的交易员们高度警惕美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将向其盟友施加更大压力，要求加大军费开支的任何迹象。【原文：Traders in the Japanese government bond market are on high alert Tuesday for any sign that President Donald Trump will increase pressure on his ally to make a bigger boost to military spending.】

item.title: 170 亿美元抢购潮后，香港房地产基金损失惨重
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 于 2014 年押注香港的商业房地产行业，在繁华的旺角区以 7 亿港元（合 9000 万美元）的价格买下了一个 2 万平方英尺的零售空间，目标客户是寻求名牌服饰的中国大陆游客。【原文：When Blackstone Inc. bet on Hong Kong’s commercial real estate sector in 2014, it bought a 20,000-square-foot retail space in the bustling Mong Kok district for HK$700 million ($90 million) to target mainland Chinese tourists seeking brand-name wear.】

item.title: 三一重工斥资 16 亿美元上市后将首次在港交易
item.description: 挖掘机制造商三一重工股份有限公司（Sany Heavy Industry Co.【原文：Excavator manufacturer Sany Heavy Industry Co. is set to make its Hong Kong debut on Tuesday, becoming the seventh Chinese company this year to secure a billion-dollar listing in the city.】

item.title: 日本股市投资者将密切关注高市与特朗普的会晤
item.description: 日本股票投资者将重点关注日本首相佐那江隆一和美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周二的会晤，预计两国领导人将在会晤中讨论国防开支和 5500 亿美元投资基金的可能项目。【原文：Japanese stock investors will focus on a meeting between Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi and US President Donald Trump on Tuesday, where the leaders are expected to discuss defense spending and possible projects for a $550 billion investment fund.】

item.title: 接替鲍威尔担任美联储主席的五位竞争者如下
item.description: 在下一任美联储主席的激烈角逐中，仍有五位竞争者屹立不倒。【原文：Five contenders are still standing in the high-stakes race to be the next Federal Reserve chair.】

item.title: EQT 提出以 34 亿美元收购澳大利亚保险公司 AUB
item.description: 瑞典私募股权公司 EQT AB 向澳大利亚保险经纪公司 AUB Group Ltd. 提出了 52 亿澳元（约合 34 亿美元）的收购要约，在财富和养老金行业蓬勃发展的背景下，澳大利亚吸引了越来越多外国买家的关注。AUB 的股票大涨。【原文：Swedish private equity firm EQT AB made a A$5.2 billion ($3.4 billion) takeover offer for Australian insurance broker AUB Group Ltd., as the nation attracts increasing attention from foreign buyers amid a wealth and pension sector boom. AUB’s stock surged.】

item.title: 美中贸易协定乐观情绪提振风险资产：市场综述
item.description: 华盛顿和北京接近达成贸易协议的希望提振了风险资产，美股创下历史新高，加密货币也出现反弹。【原文：Hopes that Washington and Beijing are nearing a trade deal boosted riskier assets, with US stocks hitting all-time highs and crypto rallying.】

item.title: 慧科科技因怀特股票交易遭警方和监管机构突袭
item.description: WiseTech Global Ltd. 称，澳大利亚联邦警察局和一家证券监管机构的官员搜查了该公司的办公室，要求提供有关董事长兼创始人理查德-怀特（Richard White）和其他三名员工涉嫌股票交易的文件。【原文：WiseTech Global Ltd. said officers from the Australian Federal Police and a securities regulator searched its offices, seeking documents regarding alleged share trading by Chairman and founder Richard White and three other employees.】

item.title: 菲律宾银行在地区同行中利润增长领先
item.description: 在强劲贷款的帮助下，菲律宾银行今年的净利息收入增长有望成为东南亚贷款机构中最高的。【原文：Philippine banks, helped by robust loans, are poised to deliver the highest net interest income growth among Southeast Asian lenders this year.】

item.title: 银河数码在发行 10 亿美元可交换债券后下挫
item.description: 银河数码公司（Galaxy Digital Inc.【原文：Shares of Galaxy Digital Inc. plunged in after-hours trading after the company’s operating partnership announced a $1 billion sale of exchangeable bonds.】

item.title: 加拿大 Wealthsimple 股权融资估值 100 亿加元
item.description: Wealthsimple Financial Corp. 在最新一轮股权融资中筹集了 7.5 亿加元（5.36 亿美元），这将使这家金融服务公司的估值达到 100 亿加元，成为加拿大最有价值的初创企业之一。【原文：Wealthsimple Financial Corp. raised C$750 million ($536 million) in the latest equity round that would value the financial services firm at C$10 billion, making it one of Canada’s most valuable startups.】

item.title: 汽车贷款公司 First Help Notes 面临 Kroll 下调评级的风险
item.description: 汽车贷款公司 First Help Financial 四笔交易中的七类票据面临被 Kroll 债券评级机构降级的风险，因为抵押品组合的损失不断增加。【原文：Seven classes of notes from four deals by auto lender First Help Financial are at risk of being downgraded by Kroll Bond Ratings Agency after losses mounted in collateral portfolios.】

item.title: 力拓称澳大利亚铝冶炼厂考虑关闭
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto Plc）表示，澳大利亚托马戈（Tomago）铝冶炼厂正在考虑关闭，因为预计从 2029 年起电力成本的增加将使该厂的运营变得不可行。【原文：Rio Tinto Plc said the Tomago aluminum smelter in Australia is considering closing as a projected increase in power costs from 2029 would leave operations unviable.】

item.title: 私人信贷公司削减杠杆率的热门策略胜过 Keurig Dr Pepper
item.description: Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. 遇到了一个问题：投资者对该公司拟收购 JDE Peet's NV 时将承担多少债务持怀疑态度。【原文：Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. had a problem: Investors were skeptical of how much debt the company would be taking on with its proposed acquisition of JDE Peet’s NV.】

item.title: 在特朗普的帮助下，安瓦尔将马来西亚变成了交易的舞台
item.description: 从美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周日在吉隆坡走下飞机的那一刻起，他和马来西亚总统安瓦尔-易卜拉欣之间的关系就显而易见。【原文：From the moment US President Donald Trump stepped off the plane in Kuala Lumpur on Sunday, it was clear that he and his Malaysian counterpart Anwar Ibrahim shared a rapport.】

item.title: Norinchukin 坚持信贷押注，以修复 2,660 亿美元的投资组合
item.description: Norinchukin 银行并没有因为美国最近的信贷危机而放弃增加在该领域投资的计划。【原文：Norinchukin Bank isn’t letting recent credit blowups in the US deter it from a plan to increase investments in the space.】

item.title: 马杜罗盟友称诺贝尔奖得主马查多应失去委内瑞拉公民身份
item.description: 委内瑞拉一名政治家和总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗的盟友正在推动该国最高法院剥夺反对派领导人玛丽亚-科里纳-马查多（María Corina Machado）和埃德蒙多-冈萨雷斯（Edmundo González）的公民身份。【原文：A Venezuelan politician and ally of President Nicolás Maduro is pushing the country’s top court to strip opposition leaders María Corina Machado and Edmundo González of their citizenship.】
